properties.name: shopify.admin-api-access-token
properties.description: An app-wide API access token (for custom apps).

properties.name: shopify.api-key
properties.description: The API key for your app (Client ID).

properties.name: shopify.api-secret-key
properties.description: The API secret key for your app (Client Secret).

properties.name: shopify.custom-shop-domains
properties.description: Override values for Shopify shop domains.

properties.name: shopify.host-name
properties.description: The host name of your app.

properties.name: shopify.host-scheme
properties.description: The scheme to use for the app host.

properties.name: shopify.is-custom-store-app
properties.description: Whether the app is a Shopify admin custom store app.

properties.name: shopify.is-embedded-app
properties.description: Whether the app is embedded in the Shopify admin.

properties.name: shopify.is-testing
properties.description: Whether the app is initialized for local testing.

properties.name: shopify.logging.level
properties.description: The minimum severity level to log.

properties.name: shopify.private-app-storefront-access-token
properties.description: An app-wide API access token for the storefront API (for custom apps).

properties.name: shopify.scopes
properties.description: The scopes your app needs to access the API.

properties.name: shopify.user-agent-prefix
properties.description: The user agent prefix to use for API requests.
